EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://networks.nokia.com/]]> Thank you for registering Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Thank you for registering for: {{my.EventName:default=edit me}}.
Use the link below to enter the webinar.

Thank you and enjoy the webinar!
